forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As night envelops Downtown San Francisco, the city dances between shades of gray and the soft golden glow of streetlights. The forecast hints at a gentle evening, with temperatures settling around a crisp 58 degrees, accompanied by a subtle breeze whispering from the west. It appears the fog, that enigmatic companion of the Bay, lingers at the fringes, reclining comfortably across the skyline, perhaps hinting at a marine layer inching its way in, but not imposing on the tranquility of the night.

Looking ahead to Sunday, expect the sun to emerge, painting the day with warmth and light. Temperatures will hover near 69, gradually easing into a cooler embrace of 67 by the afternoon. Light winds will stir, each gust a soft reminder of the changing seasons, making it advisable to dress in layers. As the sun arcs overhead, consider a leisurely stroll through one of the many parks, where the flora breathes with renewed vibrancy under the sun’s nurturing gaze. Alternatively, seek out a cozy café, where the warmth of a mug can complement the delightful ambiance, allowing for quiet moments of reflection or conversation with a friend amidst the hustle of the day.
